T02D3248:13b-1: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3248:13b-3: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3248:13b-4: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3248:13b-5: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas zla ba la yi ge
T02D3248:13b-6: bh'um dkar pos bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma dkar
T02D3248:13b-7: mo zhal gsum spyan gsum ma /
T02D3248:13b-8: gzhon nu ma lang tshol bab pa /
T02D3248:13b-9: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyag brgyad ma bsam par bya pa'o //
T02D3248:13b-10: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni ser mo dang nag mo'o //
T02D3248:13b-11: g-yas kyi phyag bzhin ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D3248:13b-12: padma la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3248:13b-15: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi na ni gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang /
T02D3248:13b-16: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag gis bum pa gang ba'o //
T02D3248:13b-17: mchod rten gyi nang na bzhugs pa ste /
T02D3248:13b-18: dbu rgyan la rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa nges par rdzogs par byas la /
T02D3248:13b-19: rang gi sa bon padma la gnas pa snying gar bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3248:13b-20: de'i rjes la spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang /
T02D3248:13b-23: rkang pa rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3248:13b-24: du h'um tr'am hr'i:aam a'a:zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga
T02D3248:13b-26: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ba ni /
T02D3248:13b-28: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs so /
T02D3248:14a-0: // / aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong @14a * //
